name: ScienceDaily
0:
”Alexa open science daily”
”Alexa ask science daily to get categories”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: science daily
des: Have Alexa tell you all about Science Daily. Keep you informed every day with flash briefings, deals of the day, quote of the day, relevant articles, and more. - This skill works on all Alexa devices and Alexa enabled smartphones, tablets, and PCs.
